fields.description: In Ti SDK 2.1.4 Ti.UI.SIZE on height for a TableView does not take into account HeaderView, FooterView, SectionHeaderView or SectionFooterView.
fields.summary: iOS: TableView height Ti.UI.SIZE does not take into account HeaderView, FooterView, SectionHeaderView or SectionFooterView

comments.body:
Hi David,

So what I've done is changed this to a bug report and linked the issue you mentioned.

If you could now provide a simple test case for this, I will happily move this to TiMob.

Thanks!
